column4: 2. question =) which1 is better  " Intel GMA X3100 " or " nVIDIA GeForce Go 8600M GT" ??????? Thank you again =)
they are both good chipsets, it all depends on how much extra you want to pay for the nvidia and/or if you want it for extreme gaming for example.
the X3100 for example will play a lot of games without a glitch, but don't expect heavy intensive FPS games like fear or crysis to play on full gfx :)
the x3100 plays fifa08 smoothly for example, and UT2004 so it all depends on your personal needs.
